Unlike SystemMenu the tab menu contains items related to the current tab/pane/split only.

<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/ConEmuTabMenu.png" title="ConEmu tab menu" alt="ConEmu tab menu">

You may pop up tab menu in several ways:

  * by right mouse clicking on the tab;
  * by holding *Shift* key and right clicking on the console contents;
  * by pressing Apps+Space.
